name: Dashbouquet Development
tagline: Reliable team aligned to deliver solutions
description:
Dashbouquet Development is a custom software development agency, located in Belarus. We help startups to build their big things fast and we help to get corporate software products from the stage of concept to production.
We do full development cycle: from prototype and designs to final testing and market launch and production support.
We are experts in:
Frontend Development. We offer services in web, native and cross-platform apps development, UI/UX design and software testing. We use Typescript, React\Redux\Saga\-*, React Native, Vue, Angular, Webpack, etc. to deliver best solutions.
Backend Development. We support our advanced frontend solutions with strong backend based on top-notch technologies:NodeJS, MongoDB, AWS, Docker, Restful API, GraphQL, Loopback, Hadoop,  pusher, neo4j, firebase etc.
Machine Learning and custom AI-driven solutions for your business. Our team is experts in data visualization, prediction models, data mining and computer vision leveraging technolgies like fast.ai, Keras, OpenCV, PyTorch, TensorFlow etc. We help our customers maximize the value of their data with custom dashboards and reports. 
We forge the partnership based on trust the way it should be.
